
display byte variables 
num1: 	0x60025c:	17
num2: 	0x60025d:	9
res1: 	0x60025e:	26
res2: 	0x60025f:	8
res3: 	0x600260:	153
res4: 	0x600262:	1
rem4: 	0x600263:	8

display word variables 
num3: 	0x600264:	5003
num4: 	0x600266:	7
res3: 	0x600268:	5010
res6: 	0x60026a:	4996
res7: 	0x60026c:	35021
res8: 	0x600270:	714
rem8: 	0x600272:	5

display doubleword variables 
num5: 	0x600274:	100007
num6: 	0x600278:	1501
res9: 	0x60027c:	101508
res10: 	0x600280:	98506
res11: 	0x600284:	150110507
res12: 	0x60028c:	66
rem12: 	0x600290:	941

display quadword variables 
num7: 	0x600294:	12342314
num8: 	0x60029c:	14541
res13: 	0x6002a4:	12356855
res14: 	0x6002ac:	12327773
res15: 	0x6002b4:	179469587874
res16: 	0x6002c4:	848
rem16: 	0x6002cc:	11546
